name: Reverberation (AwesomeTrinket)
description:
Sound on is REQUIRED to play this game! 

Note: I am aware of the graphics clash between most of the world and Scarlett/some other objects! As this was made for a game jam, I didn't have time to draw all of my own graphics. I'm not happy with a lot of things in this game as-is; after the jam, I plan on fleshing out this story WAY more and drawing all my own graphics.

Reverberation is a story told solely through visuals and sound, about a 16 year old girl named Scarlett experiencing her world in a different light for the first time. Created with RPGMaker MV for the Wanderjahre Narrative Game Jam #3!

Restriction: No Text & Anagnorisis
Theme: House Under the Stairs

This game was a bit of an experiment for me, because this was the first time I made my own visuals/graphics, and the first "major" mapping I'd done in RPGMaker MV. (Prior to that, the most I'd done was sprite the inside of somebody's house.) A huge part of the struggle was trying to convey as much story as I could through symbols, sound effects and Scarlett's expressions. 

Songs created by Rinzai Gigen! https://itch.io/profile/rinzai-gigen
